system.description:
You are strong enough to lift anyone, and an ally can ride on top of you if you let them. When you pick someone up and throw them, roll +Courage.

On a 7+, they go roughly where you wanted them to.

On a 6-, they go where they wanted to.

On a 10+, you choose one. On a 9-, they choose one:

  • They land safely on their feet, avoiding harm.
  • They crash into someone, dealing damage to whoever they hit.
  • They crash through something, taking damage and destroying it.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They go where they wanted to.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: They go roughly where you wanted them to. They choose one: land safely on their feet, avoiding harm; crash into someone, dealing damage to whoever they hit; or crash through something, taking damage and destroying it.

success.label: Success!
success.value: They go roughly where you wanted them to. You choose one: they land safely on their feet, avoiding harm; they crash into someone, dealing damage to whoever they hit; or they crash through something, taking damage and destroying it.
